description: The birthday wake up is an honored tradition among good friends.  Today is Astengo's birthday, and his roommates, Krave Moore and Red have been looking forward to it for weeks. But no birthday party's over until the most special attendee, the birthday boy, gets fucked hard at both ends.  Get into your birthday suit and join the party!Enjoy!
title: Birthday Wake Up
